availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William H. Clements (Union County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married Caroline Francis Cambron Clements on February 10, 1857 in Union County. Father of Mary C. Clements. Farmer in Union County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 347.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Union County, p. 404B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film #000562172, p. 295.
Find A Grave, "W. H. Clements (1833-1876)," Memorial #11604786, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/11604786 (accessed January 23, 2020).
